sentences.english: Yup, that’s right, helmets and seatbelts.
sentences.chinese: 对，就是这样，头盔和安全带。

sentences.english: These results might provide a medical basis for the design of liquid-cooled helmet and cooling equipments.
sentences.chinese: 为液冷头盔及致冷装置的设计，提供了医学实验依据。

sentences.english: I hope you ride my bike without a helmet and get hit by a monster truck.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你骑我的自行车时没戴头盔被一辆泥头车撞死。

sentences.english: It appears to be a team-colored thermoplastic helmet, of the variety typically associated with firefighters.
sentences.chinese: 外型是顶根据队伍决定颜色的热塑性消防员头盔。

sentences.english: Rick chinned the helmet stud again and told Bela to make it quick.
sentences.chinese: 瑞克连通头盔话筒，告诉贝拉动作要快。
为什么穿斯内尔认证的头盔？

sentences.english: Bulletproof helmets are widely used to prevent bullets and fragments.
sentences.chinese: 防弹头盔通常用以防子弹或破片。

sentences.english: Two sets of protective clothing with gloves and helmet shall be provided.
sentences.chinese: 须备有兩套保护衣物，連同手套以及头盔。

sentences.english: Kurt hit him, his flattened palm connecting with the underside of Tom's helmet.
sentences.chinese: 库尔特打击他，他伸平手掌拍在汤姆头盔的下面。

sentences.english: But I will add an helmet, to make it like a new version of Gatchaman.
sentences.chinese: 不过，我会添加一个头盔，使像小飞侠的新版本。

sentences.english: Always require that your child wear a bike helmet, no matter how long or short the ride is.
sentences.chinese: 通常规定不管骑车时间长短，你的孩子都要戴上头盔。

sentences.english: You will be provided with a caving helmet, head lamp and ropes as required.
sentences.chinese: 您将获得探险所需的头盔，头灯和绳索。

sentences.english: Helmed visors with a leonine head for a crest hid the features of their captors.
sentences.chinese: 用狮头作装饰的头盔隐藏了他们的逮捕者的面部特征。

sentences.english: I am buying armatures of all japanese vehicle our company is esteblish in Maldives . PLS CONTACT US.
sentences.chinese: 我们求购日本车辆适用的摩托车头盔，请与我们联系。

sentences.english: According to the detection method , it has designed a set of detection systems of photoelectric helmet sighting device.
sentences.chinese: 根据检测方法，设计了一套光电头盔瞄准具检测系统。

sentences.english: A miner's lamp is fixed onto his helmet.
sentences.chinese: 矿灯巩固在矿工的头盔上。
